description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Zombie killing action! Survive as many rounds as you can! Up to four players on a local machine with multiple characters, a variety of weapons, two intriguing worlds and almost certain death. Grab your friends and fight your way through the zombie devastation in a fun cartoon world with plenty of zombie killing dance music to start a revolution!
